transition_trope.name: The Chosen (Summoning)
transition_trope.impact: High starting stakes; immediate, shared, external Quest. GM can grant a minor Starting Boon.

transition_trope.name: The Fluke (Accidental Transport)
transition_trope.impact: High Survival challenge; self-defined goals. Start with limited gear and potential initial Lingering Injury.

logic_trope.name: The Game World (LitRPG Logic)
logic_trope.impact: XP and Proficiency Bonuses should be openly discussed. Activates 'System Wielder' benefits fully.
logic_trope.rule_override: Use visible Skill Checks tied to Proficiency.

logic_trope.name: The Political World (Social Logic)
logic_trope.impact: Focus on Intrigue and Diplomacy. Activates 'Charmer' benefits fully.
logic_trope.rule_override: Must use the Reputation Score Module.

logic_trope.name: The Grim World (Survival Logic)
logic_trope.impact: Focus on resource management and caution. Activates 'Crafter' benefits fully.
logic_trope.rule_override: Use Gritty Realism Rest Rules (Long Rest = 7 days).

source_scarcity.name: Woven Magic (High Availability)
source_scarcity.impact: Standard 5E spellcasting works perfectly; magic is common.

source_scarcity.name: Rare Magic (Low Availability)
source_scarcity.impact: Casters may require specific Foci for 3rd level+ spells.
source_scarcity.rule_override: Use Wild Magic Surge on a natural 1 for 3rd level+ spells.

source_scarcity.name: Personal Magic (Internal Availability)
source_scarcity.rule_override: Casters may use Mana Point Pool optional rules.

integration_level.name: Compatible
integration_level.impact: Magic and technology enhance each other. Crafter Archetype excels.

integration_level.name: Nullifying
integration_level.impact: Magic and technology repel. Modern electronics short out near 3rd level spells.

integration_level.name: Oblivious
integration_level.impact: Magic and technology ignore each other. Modern weapons provide a unique, unmagical advantage.

philosophy.name: The Order (Lawful/Efficient)
philosophy.impact: Strict rules, guaranteed safety/pay. Favors System Wielder.

philosophy.name: The Market (Chaotic/Decadent)
philosophy.impact: Shady quests, negotiable contracts. Favors Charmer.

philosophy.name: The Crucible (Grim/Survival)
philosophy.impact_note: Applies Crafting Multiplier x2. Favors Crafter.

ranking_mechanism.name: Point-Based Advancement
ranking_mechanism.impact: Rank determined by accumulated Guild Seals (e.g., 100 Seals per rank). Visible progression.

ranking_mechanism.name: Patron-Based Advancement
ranking_mechanism.impact: Rank requires successful completion of Rank-Up Trials for powerful NPCs. Subject to political favor.

features.name: Action Economy Mastery
features.mechanic: Once/SR or LR, use a limited action (potion, draw weapon) as a Bonus Action.

features.name: Break the System
features.mechanic: Once/LR, declare a damaging attack/spell a Critical Hit before the roll.

features.name: Rapid Fabrication
features.mechanic: Gain proficiency in one tool. Halve time for mundane crafting (8hr -> 1hr).

features.name: Modern Synthesis
features.mechanic: Once/LR, grant a potion/scroll a temporary boost (+2 DC or +2 damage).

features.name: World-Tech Integration
features.mechanic: Once/LR, spend 1 min to modify a non-artifact magic item for 1 hour (GM's discretion).

features.name: Faction Magnet
features.mechanic: Gain Persuasion proficiency. Use PB pool for +1 bonus on Charisma checks (refreshes LR).

features.name: Reputation Anchor
features.mechanic: Successful non-combat negotiation raises party reputation with that faction by one tier.

features.name: Recruitment Drive
features.mechanic: Once/LR, DC 17 Persuasion check to gain a temporary CR 2 or lower ally for 1d4 days.

tiers.name: Exotic Components (Monster Parts)
tiers.use: Tier I + potent potions, specialized tools.
tiers.formula_note: Crafting DC = Base DC (10) + (Rarity Score x Multiplier (2)).

tiers.name: Essence and Core Materials
tiers.use: Mandatory for permanent magic items and enchanting. High market value.
